title: Kevin McCarthy, Nancy Pelosi and Pete Ricketts call for Jeff Fortenberry to resign from Congress - KETV Omaha
content:
1. Kevin McCarthy, Nancy Pelosi and Pete Ricketts call for Jeff Fortenberry to resign from Congress  KETV Omaha
  2. McCarthy On Rep. Fortenberry: 'When Someone Is Convicted, It's Time To Resign'  NBC News
  3. Nebraska congressman found guilty of lying to FBI about foreign campaign contribution  Fox News
  4. GOP Rep. Jeff Fortenberry guilty of three felonies in campaign contributions case  CNN
  5. Nebraska Congressman Faces Calls to Step Down After Convictions  The New York Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy, Speaker of the House Nancy Pelosi and Nebraska Gov. Pete Ricketts have called for Jeff Fortenberry to resign from Congress after being convicted on three felony charges for lying to the FBI about a 2016 foreign campaign contribution.
